name: ITEAM FOUNDATION

briefDescription: We have created iTeach Fellowship which is India's first, in-service one year, Teaching Fellowship for newly trained teachers providing them with soft on-boarding, one-year coaching, rewards and recognition which also assists affordable (low-income budget) private schools with their high needs of Teacher Recruitment, Coaching and Retention.
